Package com.yerdy.services.messaging

Interface Summary
YRDMessagePresenterDelegate  
 

Class Summary
YRDAppActionParser Used to translate action strings from server into a useable format
YRDBasePurchaseAction  
YRDConversionTracker  
YRDInAppPurchase Pull message In app Purchase action
YRDItemPurchase Pull message Virtual Purchase action
YRDMessage Data component of YRDMessage.
YRDMessagePreseneter Provides Android popup to handle message and integrate with YerdyMessageDelegate for additional control.
YRDMessageProcessor Parses server response and Populates YRDMessage
YRDMessageReportService This is a fire and forget HTTP GET service, used primarily for reporting stats back to server
YRDMessagingClient Delegate/Listener for YRDMessagingService
YRDMessagingService HTTP service that queries server for message to present to user via GUI
YRDReward Pull message reward
YRDRewardItem Pull Message reward item
